title: Bug 21834 - Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout. Build 2002071610021.
OB: When the Delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row is deleted. Additionally, the second row is also removed instead of remaining in place. The Launch item is moved to the first row when the delete occurs.
EB: When the Delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row should be deleted. The second row should remain in place. The Launch item should stay on the second row.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Run the attached test case. 
2. Drag the Script coolitem to the second row. 
3. Drag the Launch coolitem to the second row, putting it after the Script item. 
4. Drag the Search coolitem to the second row, putting it after the Launch coolitem. 
5. Drag the Open Type coolitem to the second row, putting it after the Search coolitem. 
6. Press the Delete button. This should delete the first item on the second row. The second row should remain in place.
